articles.author: Saijel Kishan, Jeff Green
articles.title: ‘God Bless America’ Fund Beats Political Rivals with 33% Gain - Bloomberg
articles.description: Most politically-focused funds underperformed S&P 500 during this election year.
articles.content:
The Donald Trump-led red wave was good for YALL.
Thats the ticker of the exchange-traded fund named God Bless America, which was created for God-fearing, flag-waving conservatives. The ETF returned … [+144 chars]

articles.author: Erin Blakemore
articles.title: Women less likely than men to take their meds post-stroke, study finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: Mexican American women are the least likely to take prescribed medications, while widows reported the highest medication compliance rate.
articles.content: After their first stroke, many patients are prescribed medications such as blood thinners to help prevent another attack. But more women than men arent taking their post-stroke meds, a recent analysi… [+2560 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Mastro
articles.title: Why rich Americans are ditching their fancy hotels on vacation - Business Insider
articles.description: As travelers spend less on cheap Airbnbs, high-end vacation rentals are booming.
articles.content: When Mike Kelly set up his first few Airbnbs in Fort Wayne, Indiana, in 2023, he figured it would be a successful move. It was meant to be an investment project for him and his daughter to work on to… [+10556 chars]
